| `peer-data-[state=closed]:border-3` | ✅ | <pre lang="css">.peer[data-state=closed]~.peer-data-\[state\=closed\]\:border-3{border-width:3px;}</pre> | <pre lang="css">.peer[data-state=closed]~.peer-data-\[state\=closed\]\:border-3{border-width:3px;}</pre> |
| `@container` | ✅ | <pre lang="css">.\@container{container-type:inline-size;}</pre> | <pre lang="css">.\@container{container-type:inline-size;}</pre> |
| `@container/label` | ✅ | <pre lang="css">.\@container\/label{container-type:inline-size;container-name:label;}</pre> | <pre lang="css">.\@container\/label{container-type:inline-size;container-name:label;}</pre> |
| `@container-normal` | ✅ | <pre lang="css">.\@container-normal{container-type:normal;}</pre> | <pre lang="css">.\@container-normal{container-type:normal;}</pre> |
| `@container/label-normal` | ✅ | <pre lang="css">.\@container\/label-normal{container-type:normal;container-name:label;}</pre> | <pre lang="css">.\@container\/label-normal{container-type:normal;container-name:label;}</pre> |
